Package com.dffrs.handler

Class APIHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dffrs.handler.APIHandler
  • public final class APIHandler
extends Object

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  APIHandler.Request
      Nested class responsible for creating an encoded UTF-8 URL query, used whenever an API Call is made.

    • Method Detail

      • getAPIParameterBy

        public String getAPIParameterBy​(String option)
        Public method to return an API's parameter. It uses configurations HashMap as reference to return the value. NOTE: It may return a NULL Reference, if the option is not found.
        Parameters:
        option - String to search for.
        Returns:
        String representing the parameter's value.

      • makeAPIRequest

        public com.mashape.unirest.http.HttpResponse<com.mashape.unirest.http.JsonNode> makeAPIRequest​(APIHandler.Request request)
                                                                                        throws com.mashape.unirest.http.exceptions.UnirestException
        Public method used to make an API Call, based on the configurations values, and APIHandler.Request's query. It caches the responses, for responsiveness and efficiency sake.
        Parameters:
        request - APIHandler.Request's instance to retrieve the URL query.
        Returns:
        HttpResponse object, after the call was made.
        Throws:
        com.mashape.unirest.http.exceptions.UnirestException - If the call was unsuccessful.

      • getInstance

        public static APIHandler getInstance​(String pathToFile)
        Public Static Factory method to instantiate an APIHandler object.
        Parameters:
        pathToFile - String representing the path to the Configuration Options File. Will be used on a APIConfigurationReader's instance.
        Returns:
        #APIConfigurationReader instance.
